name: Mindchaos
overview: A 200 level puzzler from 1993, the freeware game by Testaware. The game was released as part of the Assassins CD 02. A strategic game where you must turn stone numbers by clicking it to a given order. If one is selected all bordering stones will change it’s number too. More about 200 random generated levels. Game concept based on Logo by Starbyte.
